1030400.name: Ultimate Logic Puzzle Collection - Pack 1
1030400.description:
Contains 1620 new puzzles of Enter Numbers and 3000 new puzzles of Paint Cells

Enter Numbers:
  • Number Flow (240 levels)
  • Number Flow + (240 levels)
  • Ripple Effect (300 levels)
  • Makaro (180 levels)
  • Number Road (240 levels)
  • Descending (180 levels)
  • Sign In (240 levels)

Paint Cells:
  • Find Square (180 levels)
  • Crazy Pavement (240 levels)
  • Paint Area (180 levels)
  • Black Shot (180 levels)
  • Divided Rooms (240 levels)
  • Nondango (120 levels)
  • Number Cross (240 levels)
  • Water Fun (240 levels)
  • Island Country (180 levels)
  • Light and Shadow (180 levels)
  • Paint Maze (240 levels)
  • Canal View (240 levels)
  • One Liar (180 levels)
  • Paint Stripe (240 levels)
  • Stostone (120 levels)

# The new levels are evenly distributed in each size and difficulty.
